mapper.insert: insert into app_info (id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, status, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfacelanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{softwaresize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{devid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flatformid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categorylevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{categorylevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categorylevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logopicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logolocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionid,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update app_info set softwareName = #{softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APKName = #{apkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supportROM = #{supportrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interfaceLanguage = #{interfacelanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, softwareSize = #{softwaresize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, updateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE}, devId = #{devid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, appInfo = #{appinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, onSaleDate = #{onsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, offSaleDate = #{offsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flatformId = #{flatformid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, categoryLevel3 = #{categorylevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT}, downloads = #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, categoryLevel1 = #{categorylevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, categoryLevel2 = #{categorylevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, logoPicPath = #{logopicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logoLocPath = #{logolocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionId = #{versionid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, status, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId from app_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, status, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId from app_info
mapper.update:
update app_info
softwareName=#{softwareName},
supportROM=#{supportROM}, interfaceLanguage=#{interfaceLanguage}, updateDate=#{updateDate}, softwareSize=#{softwareSize}, appInfo=#{appInfo}, status=#{status}, onSaleDate=#{onSaleDate}, offSaleDate=#{offSaleDate}, categoryLevel1=#{categoryLevel1}, categoryLevel2=#{categoryLevel2}, categoryLevel3=#{categoryLevel3}, downloads=#{downloads}, flatformId=#{flatformId}, logoPicPath=#{logoPicPath}, logoLocPath=#{logoLocPath}, modifyBy=#{modifyBy}, modifyDate=#{modifyDate},
update app_info set logoPicPath=null, logoLocPath = null where id = #{id}
